text: hello and welcome to AWS what's new I'm
Jeff Barr I have some awesome launches

now turn your Aurora clusters on and on
you can stop a cluster start it up again
later it's like a light switch
off and on and off and on when you do
this it stops both the primary and any
replicas you've created while the
cluster stops you don't pay for any
instance hours your clusters stay
stopped for up to seven days an entire
week after that they return zombie-like
back to life you can use this for cyclic
apps for dev and for tests but you know
what you really need to be creative
think of an unusual way to use this in
event build something awesome and let me
know what you come up with next up we
have another instance size for the
unique f1 instances these instances have
an FPGA a field programmable gate array
this is custom hardware in the cloud our
customers use them for hardware
acceleration image processing
compression and even gene sequencing the
new size is the f1 dot 4x large this one
is in between the f1 2x large and f1 16s
large not too small not too big not too
cold not too hot you've got to Xilinx
ultra scale plus FPGAs this is a special
kind of programming you're gonna have to

would encourage you to check it out
these instances are available today in

last but most definitely not least you

watch custom dashboards from api's or

create modify and customize your

there's a new function called get metric

take this and build something really
